Create a "Bluetooth Boost" app that enhances the volume and sound quality of any Bluetooth speaker connected to your smartphone.
Develop a smart speaker that can recognize and respond to voice commands to play music from different streaming services.
Create a portable Bluetooth speaker that doubles as a charging station for your phone and other devices.
Develop a smart speaker that can connect to multiple Bluetooth devices and play music from all of them simultaneously.
Create a Bluetooth speaker that has built-in ambient lighting that syncs with the music being played.
